description.narrative: The project development objectives are to increase access to early childhood education, improve the quality of learning environments in selected public preschools, and enable a systematic measurement of education quality for informed decision-making.

participating-org.narrative: Republic of Uzbekistan through the Ministry of Finance

condition.narrative: At all times during the implementation of the Project, the Recipient, through the Ministry of Preschool Education, shall establishand maintain the Project Implementation Unit for the purposes of day-to-day Project management, monitoring and supervision with astaff (including one project coordinator, one financial management specialist, one financial management assistant, one procurementspecialist, and one monitoring and evaluation specialist), resources and terms of reference as thereafter described in the ProjectOperations Manual and all satisfactory to the International Development Association

The Recipient, through the Ministry of Preschool Education, shall carry out the Project in accordance with the requirements,criteria, organizational arrangements and operational procedures set forth in the Legal Agreements and in the Project OperationsManual and Social Impact Bond Operations Manual, and shall not amend, suspend, abrogate or waive any provisions of these ProjectManuals without prior written approval of the International Development Association. In case of any inconsistency between theprovisions of the Project Manuals and those of the Legal Agreements, those of the Legal Agreements shall prevail. Legal Agreementsmean the Financing Agreement for the IDA Credit and the two Co-Financing Grant Agreements for the Project

The Recipient, through the Ministry of Preschool Education, shall, not later than thirty days from the Effective Date, install anaccounting software satisfactory to the International Development Association

National center for education quality monitoring and measuring

baseline.value: A national center for education quality monitoring and measuring does not exist

target.value: A national center for education quality monitoring and measuring is established and operational

actual.value: A national center for education quality monitoring and measuring is established and operational.

title.narrative: General secondary education quality measurement system

baseline.value: A system to measure general secondary education quality under a systematic approach does not exist

target.value: Systematic measurements of general secondary education quality produced by the new quality assessment system are used to informplans or policies

actual.value: A system to measure general secondary education quality under a systematic approach does not exist

baseline.value: A system to measure preschool education quality does not exist

target.value: Systematic measurements of preschool education quality produced by the new quality assessment system are used to inform plans orpolicies

actual.value: A system to measure preschool education quality does not exist

title.narrative: Beneficiary feedback managed through the Engaged ECD Pilot

baseline.value: Engaged ECD Pilot does not exist and does not manage beneficiary feedback

target.value: Beneficiary feedback collected through Engaged ECD Pilot is used to inform decisions

actual.value: Engaged ECD Pilot has not yet been conducted. However, The alternative models (component 2) have included wide consultation withstakeholders including beneficiary communities and the Ministry of Mahallah Affairs. During this process, a shared vision wasdeveloped to support community take up and feedback. In addition, the development and design process of the Play-based learning APPto strengthen the quality of teaching practices has included consultation with teachers who will be the beneficiaries on contentand design - this will be expanded to parents in the next design phase. An active citizen engagement was also observed during thelast mission. A representative of teachers and parents joined the mission remotely, and the same level of participation is expectedin the upcoming mission.

title.narrative: Evaluation of alternative models of ECD service provision

baseline.value: Evaluation of alternative models has not been carried out

target.value: Results from an evaluation of alternative models are used to inform decisions

actual.value: Evaluation of alternative models has not been carried out

title.narrative: Existing national assessments of student learning outcomes

baseline.value: Existing national assessments of student learning outcomes are not aligned with international good practices, are not standardized,and are not used under a systematic approach

target.value: Completion of an action plan for reviewing and modernizing existing national assessments of student learning outcomes

actual.value: Existing national assessments of student learning outcomes are not aligned with international good practices, are not standardized,and are not used under a systematic approach

baseline.value: Lead contractor and independent evaluator are not identified

target.value: Lead contractor and independent evaluator are hired and playing their roles as defined in the SIB Operations Manual

actual.value: Lead contractor and independent evaluator are not identified

title.narrative: Policy framework for professional development in preschool education

baseline.value: Policy framework for professional development in preschool education does not exist

target.value: Policy framework for professional development in preschool education is approved by the Government of Uzbekistan

actual.value: Policy framework for professional development in preschool education does not exist
